text: Article 180 — IRB approach: PD, LGD and EAD calibration reflect downturn conditions.
Annex — IRB slotting; supervisory mapping; downturn LGD in parameter estimation.
Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR): institutions shall hold HQLA to cover 30 days of stress.
Template C 73.00: HQLA composition and outflow assumptions.
AML and KYC: customer due diligence (CDD), ongoing monitoring, PEP EDD.
Securitisation: significant risk transfer (SRT) tests; STS criteria.
Leverage Ratio: exposure measure includes derivatives and CCFs.
